transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan, Bhadar Khan ji, kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya. Haan, bataiye.
Executive: Main, ji, main bhi theek hoon sir. Main Vaishnavi baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se, Assistant Manager.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, bataiye sir, kaisa chal raha hai services? Abhi thoda kam chal diya hai kya sir use karna aapne?
Customer: Use kya karun? Jab koi bhi buyleads uthai, abhi tak saari to fake hi hain.
Executive: Saari fake nikal ja rahi hain aapki? Hmm. Abhi jaise ek jo aapne 9 November ko la, sir aap purani lead kyun purchase karte hain? Ek main dekh rahi hoon ki ekdam purani-purani, ek din purani ho ja rahi hai. Time bhi toh dusre ka likha hota hai na?
Customer: Ab ek baat batao, ek-ek piece uthaunga main buyleads?
Executive: Haan, sir. Matlab kehne ka matlab hai ki sahi se agar aap fresh lead lenge toh...
Customer: Main unse, jab maine plan liya tha, jab maine unse kaha tha ki ji main 100 piece tak ka order le leta hoon.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Unhone kaha, theek hai. Ab mujhse jo check karwaya ki aap inpe click kar dijiye, woh 30-30, 20 ki thi. Ab mujhe kya pata aap mera bewakoof banwa rahe ho?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh maine 30-30, 20 wali okay kar di, haan, yeh theek hai, yeh theek hai. Toh woh 30-30 se upar ki buyleads hi nahi aa rahi, koi 30, 50 bas maximum.
Executive: Hmm. Achha. Toh sir dekhiye kya hota hai na, kai baar client sochta hai ki pehle 10 piece ke liye baat karun, hai na? Sab aap usko bataiye ki sir 10 piece aapko mahanga padega. Wahin aap direct 100 piece loge toh aapko sasta padega.
Customer: Main na, mahanga-sasta, use kitna mahanga de dunga main? 10 piece mein mere jitna mujhe bachega nahi, usse zyada ka toh mere bike ka tel lag jayega. 10 piece bana ke dene mein. Sir, aap 10 piece ke liye maaniye nahi, main yeh keh rahi hoon. 10 piece ke liye aapne lead purchase kiya. Ab client ko bola ki sir aap 10 piece jo le rahe ho, usme isse achha aap 100 piece lo. 100 piece aapko ek toh sasta padta hai, plus hum 100 piece se neeche order nahi lete hain. Is tarah se aap thoda sa client ko bataiye.
Customer: Ek baat bataiye madam, aapko agar paanch hi piece chahiye honge toh aap 100 piece leke karogi kya?
Executive: Sir, kai baar kya hota hai, client quality check karne ke liye bhi paanch piece mangwata hai.
Customer: Main, main yeh bata, main yeh batana chah raha hoon ki IndiaMART ne mujhe dobara se bewakoof banaya. Ek baar main teen saal pehle TrustSeal chala ke bewakoof bana, aur yeh ₹28,000 phir mere se bewakoof bana ke...
Executive: Ji nahi sir, aisa nahi hai. Bas aap na thoda sa use karenge, tabhi aapko benefit dikhega.
Customer: Arre main, ek baat bataiye, dimag kharab toh shuru mein ho jata hai. Ek bhi buyleads toh aise dikhai nahi deti jise aap pick karun. Pick karta hoon woh farzi nikal jati hai.
Executive: Achha. Aur lead manager mein bhi sir aapko kuch lead aati hongi jo bulk wali bhi bhejti hain humari team. Woh aapko mili hai koi lead? Jo bulk...
Customer: Koi nahi aati bulk wali, koi bulk wali nahi aati.
Executive: Achha. Dekhiye sir, agar aisa hai na, toh main ek apne team mein complaint hi dal deti hoon ki aapko lead nahi aa rahi hai. Lekin sir, abhi dekhiye maine open kara 100 piece ki lead dikh rahi hai Delhi ki.
Customer: Maine, maine, maine unse bola tha ki mujhe Delhi NCR chahiye. Maine UP ka GST dalwaya tha. Toh woh kehne lage ki Delhi ka GST dalwaoge toh Delhi NCR ki buyleads aane lagenge aapko. Gurgaon ki mujhe ek bhi buyleads main search karta hoon, dikhai nahi deti usme.
Executive: Sir, abhi toh maine aapka open kara toh Delhi ki pehle number pe hi dikh rahi hai, 100 piece ki bhi dikh rahi hai, hooded sweat shirt ki hai.
Customer: Ab matlab ek-do baar maine hood, hood ki kya select kar li, toh hood-hood hi aayi ja rahi hai, hood ki. Aur t-shirt wagera ki koi promotional t-shirt maine kaha corporate...
Executive: Sir dekhiye, abhi yeh batao, abhi thandi ka mausam start ho gaya toh abhi kya chalega? T-shirt toh ab garmi mein chalenge na sir?
Customer: Maine kaha, main corporate ka kaam karta hoon. Agar corporate ka kaam mujhe de sakte ho aap, corporate ka kaam dilwa sakte ho toh corporate ka batana bhi. Tab main plan lunga.
Executive: Sir, kis type ka corporate aapko chahiye?
Customer: Corporate ka chahiye mujhe. Local supplyeron se koi matlab nahi hota, dukandaron se.
Executive: Sir, ab dekhiye sir, mila-jula aata hai. Ab dekhiye chal raha hai hooded, aap best selling catalog mein lagaye bhi hain. Trade sweat shirt hai.
Customer: Main nahi lagaunga. Hooded, hood mein main aise nahi bechta madam. Hood mein customize karta hoon sabka. Kisi bhi company ka main toh, abhi bhi maine toh offline bana ke diye abhi 100 jeans, jeans toh maine lagai nahi isme. Lekin jeans bhi bana ke diye maine abhi.
Executive: Hmm. Achha. Chaliye main ek kaam karti hoon sir, apne jo team hai na, unse ek baar baat kar le rahi hoon iske regarding. Lekin aap se sir request yeh hai ki aap thoda iske samay pe dikhayein, yaani ki client ka mehnat nahi aa raha, uske hisab se kaam karein. Lekin aap aise use hi nahi karenge toh main aage kuch bolungi toh wahan pe yeh aayega ki yeh toh use hi nahi kar raha hai. Humara kya fayda lene se?
Customer: Use, mujhe jo buyleads mil rahi hain, agar main koi bhi fake utha raha hoon ya kuch bhi kar raha hoon, aapki taraf se toh consume mani ja rahi hai. Chahe mujhe business mil raha hai usse ya nahi mil raha.
Executive: Haan, abhi last agar aapka check kiya jaye...
Customer: Pichle sir, aaj aapne ek kharida hai na, abhi ko kharida hai, abhi se haan. Mandeep Singh ka, haan.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Baaki usse pehle agar dekha jaye toh pichle 10-12 din se koi activity nahi hai sir. Aise nahi ho pata hai na? Agar maan lijiye aap hi ka dukaan hai sir, roz toh baithna padega na?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Dukaan kuch, yeh keh sakte ho ki ji meri factory hai. Agar main factory nahi jaunga toh kaam nahi hoga. Lekin yeh maan liya maine. Lekin ab factory mein jab kaam hi nahi hoga toh main karunga kya factory mein jaake?
Executive: Haan, woh baat theek hai. Hmm.
Customer: Ab main yahan, dar-dar bhatakta rahun aur ispe kaam milne nahi toh main isi pe hi active rahun kya? Baaki woh kaam bhi chhod do phir?
Executive: Nahi-nahi, woh baat theek hai. Lekin sir, din bhar mein aap ek lead purchase kar lijiye apni taraf se.
Customer: Toh main agar yeh ₹28,000 aap mujhe de dete ke kapda khareed leta toh main ₹28,000 ke 50, ₹50,000 kar leta.
Executive: Chaliye, ek kaam karte hain sir, thoda sa main ispe dekhti hoon. Aap bhi time dijiye, hai na? Aise mat sochiye ki kuch aapka paisa barbaad ho raha hai, yeh ho raha hai. Ek bhi sir aapki badi deal niklegi na, toh pura paisa recover ho jayega.
Customer: ₹70,000 pehle bhi mere aise hi barbaad hue hain. Ek bhi rupya nahi kamaya IndiaMART ki buyleads se. Aur isi wajah se phir main kam kar deta hoon. Kam kar deta hoon pakadna buyleads. Kyunki jo bhi main pakadta hoon, yeh kehte hain ji maine toh search hi nahi kara. Main toh search kar raha tha sir aise. Koi-koi toh gaali de deta hai ki 50 call aa chuke hain mere paas IndiaMART ke.
summary:
Concerns:

- All buyleads are fake. Old leads are purchased.

- Corporate work not provided, only local suppliers.

- No leads from Delhi NCR, despite GST registration.

- Feels IndiaMART is making him a fool.



Resolution:

- Executive will file a complaint to her team.

- Executive will discuss the issue with her team.

- Suggested to purchase at least one lead daily.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, corporate, gst, fake leads
